changeSet.author: richard.bradley@softwire.com
changeSet.sql:
-- This is only run on MySQL as the H2 database does not have the correct fields
-- The eco energy supplier images are now stored in WP as ACF image fields. -- (previously they were looked up in static files by post "slug").
-- The post IDs here match those from the previous migration -- i.e. 9535-9549, 15 entries
